Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs after 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' following 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that are immediately preceded by a rejection from any approver (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', or 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and containing 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' that do not reach 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurring within 24 hours after a rejection by a pre-approver, based on event timestamps (implied by process logic)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of the frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to the frequency of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' is followed again by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' within the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of all rejections (any 'Declaration REJECTED by ...') that are specifically 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of variants where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' is directly followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that also contain 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurrences per case across all variants that include at least one rejection loop
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
